pages.text: This highly advanced stabilizer is inhabited by a $(thing)Marid$() that supports the dimensional matrix in keeping the storage dimension stable, thus allowing to store even more items.

pages.heading: Infusion
pages.ingredients: $(li)1x $(item)Storage Stabilizer Tier 3 $()$(li)1x $(item)Iesnium Block $()$(li)1x $(item)Dragon Head $() $(li)2x $(item)Spirit Attuned Crystal $()
